quotes.name: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.

quotes.name: Charlie Munger
quotes.quote: The big money is not in the buying or selling, but in the waiting.

quotes.name: Benjamin Graham
quotes.quote: The investor’s chief problem—and even his worst enemy—is likely to be himself.

quotes.name: Peter Lynch
quotes.quote: Know what you own, and know why you own it.

quotes.name: John Bogle
quotes.quote: Time is your friend, impulse is your enemy.

quotes.name: Ray Dalio
quotes.quote: He who lives by the crystal ball will eat shattered glass.

quotes.name: Philip Fisher
quotes.quote: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.

quotes.name: Jesse Livermore
quotes.quote: The stock market is never obvious. It is designed to fool most of the people, most of the time.

quotes.name: Howard Marks
quotes.quote: You can’t predict, but you can prepare.

quotes.name: George Soros
quotes.quote: It’s not whether you’re right or wrong, but how much money you make when you’re right and how much you lose when you’re wrong.

quotes.name: Paul Tudor Jones
quotes.quote: Losers average losers.

quotes.name: Carl Icahn
quotes.quote: In risk there is reward.

quotes.name: Seth Klarman
quotes.quote: The single greatest edge an investor can have is a long-term orientation.

quotes.name: Mohnish Pabrai
quotes.quote: Heads, I win; tails, I don’t lose much.

quotes.name: John Templeton
quotes.quote: Bull markets are born on pessimism, grow on skepticism, mature on optimism, and die on euphoria.

quotes.name: Joel Greenblatt
quotes.quote: If you don’t feel comfortable owning a stock for 10 years, you shouldn’t own it for 10 minutes.

quotes.name: David Einhorn
quotes.quote: No matter how much research you do, you're never certain.

quotes.name: Irving Kahn
quotes.quote: Patience is the key to successful investing.

quotes.name: Bill Ackman
quotes.quote: If you can be right 60% of the time, you will be a hero on Wall Street.

quotes.name: James Simons
quotes.quote: Past performance is the best predictor of success.

quotes.name: Peter Thiel
quotes.quote: Brilliant thinking is rare, but courage is in even shorter supply than genius.

quotes.name: Nick Sleep
quotes.quote: The longest distance in investing is the journey from the head to the heart.

quotes.name: Michael Burry
quotes.quote: The best investments are often those that make you feel most uncomfortable at the time you make them.

quotes.name: Ken Fisher
quotes.quote: The stock market is the story of cycles and of the human behavior that is responsible for overreactions in both directions.

quotes.name: Jim Rogers
quotes.quote: The way to get rich is to find what is of value and underappreciated.

quotes.name: Ed Seykota
quotes.quote: Win or lose, everybody gets what they want from the market.

quotes.name: Stanley Druckenmiller
quotes.quote: The best economist I know is the stock market.

quotes.name: Bill Miller
quotes.quote: The market does not trade based on reality. It trades based on perception.

quotes.name: Whitney Tilson
quotes.quote: Investing is not about beating others at their game. It’s about controlling yourself at your own game.

quotes.name: T. Boone Pickens
quotes.quote: The biggest risk is not taking a risk.

quotes.name: David Tepper
quotes.quote: There's a time to make money and a time to not lose money.

quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie
quotes.quote: The wise young man or wage earner of today invests his money in real estate.

quotes.name: Walter Schloss
quotes.quote: Fear and greed are probably the worst emotions to have in connection with the purchase and sale of stocks.

quotes.name: Bruce Greenwald
quotes.quote: The key to investing is to understand the competition.

quotes.name: Thomas Rowe Price Jr.
quotes.quote: Change is the investor’s only certainty.

quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki
quotes.quote: The poor and middle-class work for money. The rich have money work for them.

quotes.name: Charlie D. Ellis
quotes.quote: In investing, the biggest problem is that the winners own more of the market than the losers.

quotes.name: Jean-Marie Eveillard
quotes.quote: The value of patience and discipline cannot be overstated.

quotes.name: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala
quotes.quote: Never invest at unreasonable valuations. Never run for companies which are in limelight.

quotes.name: Vijay Kedia
quotes.quote: Investing is like yoga. Body, mind, and soul have to be aligned.

quotes.name: Raamdeo Agrawal
quotes.quote: Wealth is created by holding quality stocks for a long time.

quotes.name: Naval Ravikant
quotes.quote: Play long-term games with long-term people.

quotes.name: Aswath Damodaran
quotes.quote: The value of an asset is what someone else is willing to pay for it.

quotes.name: Chris Davis
quotes.quote: It's the temperament, not the intellect, that makes you a great investor.

quotes.name: Guy Spier
quotes.quote: Avoid situations where you are prone to making irrational decisions.

quotes.name: Michael Steinhardt
quotes.quote: The hardest thing to judge is what level of risk is safe.

quotes.name: Chuck Akre
quotes.quote: Great companies are like great wine; they get better with age.

quotes.name: Marty Whitman
quotes.quote: A great company is one that can compound its intrinsic value per share over time.
